AbstractHTML:
Warning: This package is still under development and this version is to be considered a working, but preliminary one.

This packages contains a collection of methods for the constructive recognition of groups. It is mostly intended for permutation groups, matrix groups and projective groups.

BannerString:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Loading  recog 1.3.2 - methods for constructive recognition

by Max Neunhöffer (http://www-groups.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~neunhoef) and
   Ákos Seress
with contributed code by:
     Nurullah Ankaralioglu,
     Peter Brooksbank (http://www.facstaff.bucknell.edu/pbrooksb/),
     Frank Celler (http://www.celler.de/),
     Stephen Howe,
     Maska Law,
     Steve Linton (http://www-circa.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~sal/),
     Gunter Malle (http://www.mathematik.uni-kl.de/~malle/),
     Alice Niemeyer (http://www.maths.uwa.edu.au/~alice/),
     Eamonn O'Brien (http://www.math.auckland.ac.nz/~obrien/),
     Colva M. Roney-Dougal (http://www-groups.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~colva),
 and Max Horn (https://www.quendi.de/math).
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
